nodes.text: Offscreen, but Not Forgotten: Mini-Rigs, Body-Rigs, and Other Kenner Vehicles

"Offscreen, but Not Forgotten: Mini-Rigs, Body-Rigs, and Other Kenner Vehicles" is an article written by Tim Veekhoven and published through the Star Wars Blog on October 14, 2013. It examines several low-price-point toys produced by the toy company Kenner for its 1980s Star Wars toy line, as well as how those toys have figured in Expanded Universe stories.
